Uses of Class
org.eclipse.californium.core.CoapClient

  • Packages that use CoapClient 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.californium.core  

    • Uses of CoapClient in org.eclipse.californium.core

      Methods in org.eclipse.californium.core that return CoapClient 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CoapClient CoapClient.Builder.create()
      Creates the CoapClient
      CoapClient CoapResource.createClient()
      Creates a CoapClient that uses the same executor as this resource and one of the endpoints that this resource belongs to.
      CoapClient CoapResource.createClient(String uri)
      Creates a CoapClient that uses the same executor as this resource and one of the endpoints that this resource belongs to.
      CoapClient CoapResource.createClient(URI uri)
      Creates a CoapClient that uses the same executor as this resource and one of the endpoints that this resource belongs to.
      CoapClient CoapClient.setDestinationContext(org.eclipse.californium.elements.EndpointContext peerContext)
      Set destination endpoint context.
      CoapClient CoapClient.setEndpoint(Endpoint endpoint)
      Sets the endpoint this client is supposed to use.
      CoapClient CoapClient.setExecutor(ExecutorService executor)
      Sets the executor service for this client.
      CoapClient CoapClient.setExecutor(ExecutorService executor, boolean detach)
      Sets the executor service for this client.
      CoapClient CoapClient.setTimeout(Long timeout)
      Sets the maximum amount of time that synchronous method calls will block and wait.
      CoapClient CoapClient.setURI(String uri)
      Sets the destination URI of this client.
      CoapClient CoapClient.useCONs()
      Let the client use Confirmable requests.
      CoapClient CoapClient.useEarlyNegotiation(int size)
      Let the client use early negotiation for the blocksize (16, 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, or 1024).
      CoapClient CoapClient.useExecutor()
      Sets a single-threaded executor to this client.
      CoapClient CoapClient.useLateNegotiation()
      Let the client use late negotiation for the block size (default).
      CoapClient CoapClient.useNONs()
      Let the client use Non-Confirmable requests.
